maximized.description: If the window should be automatically maximized.

resizable.description: If the window should be resizable.

control_box.description: If the window should have a control box (minimize, maximize and close buttons).

minimizable.description: If the window should be minimizable.

maximizable.description: If the window should be maximizable.

fullscreen.description: If the window should be fullscreen by default.

always_on_top.description: If the window should be always on top.

zoomcontrol.description: If the zoom control should be enabled.

show_in_taskbar.description: If the window should be shown in the taskbar.

context_menu.description: If the context menu should be enabled.

dev_tools.description: If developer tools should be enabled.

block_close.description: If the window should be blocked from closing.

additional_cmd.description: Additional command to run in the webfiles folder after starting the window (in a hidden cmd.exe window, use call to stay hidden or start to create a window).
